email_subject: Just Released! Exclusive new animation from Stan Lee
email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 03/03/2000 08:36 AM --------------------------- "the shockwave.com team" on 03/03/2000 12:29:38 AM Please respond to To: pallen@enron.com cc: Subject: Just Released! Exclusive new animation from Stan Lee Dear Phillip, 7th Portal is a super hero action/adventure, featuring a global band of teenage game testers who get pulled into a parallel universe (through the 7th Portal) created through a warp in the Internet. The fate of the earth and the universe is in their hands as they fight Mongorr the Merciful -- the evil force in the universe. The legendary Stan Lee, creator of Spiderman and the Incredible Hulk, brings us "Let the Game Begin," episode #1 of 7th Portal -- a new series exclusively on shockwave.com. - the shockwave.com team ===================== Advertisement ===================== Don't miss RollingStone.com!
